trans-unit.target: Juntas de Alta Calidad was founded in 1990, we are dedicated to the production and marketing of heavy-duty gaskets for diesel engines: Cummins, Perkins, Mercedes-Benz and Navistar, as well for transmissions. Our organization was created due to the high demand in the cargo and transportation market in the country for gaskets that ensure proper operation of each of the components.
we have a great variety of gaskets in our lines of products.
